ing: 4 Red Delicious apples - peeled, cored and diced
des: "This apple-cinnamon-pecan topping is excellent on pancakes, waffles, French toast, or as filling in a crepe."
ins: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in apples, brown sugar, corn syrup, cinnamon and pecans. When bubbling, reduce heat to low. Simmer until apples are soft, and syrup has thickened slightly, 10 to 15 minutes.
